text: Pseudostixis flavomarmorata is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Stephan von Breuning in 1964, originally as Pseudostixis flavomarmoratus. It is known from the Democratic Republic of the Congo.BioLib.cz - Pseudostixis flavomarmorata. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Phrissomini Category:Beetles described in 1964
title: Pseudostixis flavomarmorata
